channel.title: DestinationPK V1+V2 [Delta]
channel.description:
hi moparscape.
i got like a half year 2 old serverfiles on dropbox that i don't use so i just gonna release it for the people who wants it.
Don't gonna start a war here or shit i am a beginner so i didn't do much.
DestinationPK V1
This source i started up 1 and a half year ago when i was new in the rsps it was my first source it was not a great source but i was happy with it because i made it at my own
Pics
[url=http://postimg.org/image/qod3k1uut/][img]http://s2.postimg.org/qod3k1uut/Destination_PK_Client_Admin_PKPoints_Shop.png[/img][/url]
[url=http://postimg.org/image/pefa5012t/][img]http://s2.postimg.org/pefa5012t/Destination_PK_Client_Barrows_Shop.png[/img][/url]
[url=http://postimg.org/image/hvw4wd9px/][img]http://s2.postimg.org/hvw4wd9px/Destination_PK_Client_FFA_room.png[/img][/url]
[url=http://postimg.org/image/gd0qre35h/][img]http://s2.postimg.org/gd0qre35h/Destination_PK_Client_Home.png[/img][/url]
[url=http://postimg.org/image/lqziyxsvp/][img]http://s2.postimg.org/lqziyxsvp/Destination_PK_Client_PVP_Outside.png[/img][/url]
[url=http://postimg.org/image/9ewmlg511/][img]http://s2.postimg.org/9ewmlg511/Destination_PK_Client_Shops.png[/img][/url]
Credits.
45% Frostiescape for the source. 45% to someone for the client i used (don't remember the name). 10% me for changing home adding some costums changing shops etc.
(Server+Client pack) Download Link http://www.mediafire.com/download/pdktaiom8akz899/DestinationPK_V1_Server%2BClient.rar
DestinationPK V2
This was my second source that i coded i was happy with it because it has chaotics vesta stats etc. Again this is not the best source ever and i am still a beginner in this so again i didn't do much so don't come here to start a war.
Pics
[url=http://postimg.org/image/j5vc9e1cd/][img]http://s14.postimg.org/j5vc9e1cd/home.png[/img][/url]
[url=http://postimg.org/image/3vqvogggd/][img]http://s14.postimg.org/3vqvogggd/PK_Shop.png[/img][/url]
[url=http://postimg.org/image/s264dbryl/][img]http://s14.postimg.org/s264dbryl/Wild.png[/img][/url]
Credits. Frostiescape 40% for the source the guy that made this awesome client (don't remmember name) 45% me for changing shops home bonuses etc. 15%
(Source and Client) Download Link: http://www.mediafire.com/download/nv9t22e942ewct7/DestinationPK_V2_Client%2BServer.rar
my first 2 servers i know that this is really oldschool for you but some people still like those sources and this is the easyest source u can code so if u are a beginner or a pro-coder everybody can code this. if you got some tips for me i take them to my next server working atm on a 317 PI.
